text:
A small pond tucked away at an unassuming corner of the Park.
The pond's surrounding have numerous wood carvings on display.
Small pond near in Car park and connected to Mangrove boardwalk. There are many wooden sculptures around this pond.
Beautifully calm pond with monitors and kingfishers

Is an ecological pool near Carpark B
There are surprises every time I come here
Various birds and otters often forage in this pond or nearby waterways.
It often attracts a large number of photography enthusiasts to take photos.
